comment: Example configuration using MIXED voice and chime sounds
description: This configuration demonstrates maximum customization: critical notifications use chimes (no AI voice), while completion events use voice feedback. Best of both worlds!

scenario_3_granular_control.description: Different sounds for different workflow stages
